column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType

#Text=Main Bumi Korra Kya Tenzin Tonraq Unalaq Antagonists Northern military Southern Water Tribe rebels says : " Minor Bolin Desna and Eska Jinora Mako Meelo Naga Pabu Pema Senna Varrick Zhu Li " Shiro Shinobi says : " Love is in the air !
#Text=" Korra says : " Feels good to be back , although Tarrlok is n't too happy about my leave of absence .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hey , you joined the Fire Ferrets before you joined his task force .
#Text=" Mako says : " Okay , come on , team huddle time !
#Text=" Mako says : " It 's our first match of the tournament tonight .
#Text=I know the three of us have n't been a team for very long , but even so , the Fire Ferrets have never been this good .
#Text=Are we ready ?
#Text=" Korra and Bolin says : " We 're ready !
#Text=" Asami says : " Not quite , you 'll need these .
#Text=" Mako says : " Hey , Asami .
#Text=" Asami says : " Good morning , sweetie .
#Text=" Mako says : " These new uniforms look great !
#Text=" Asami says : " You look great , champ !
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , teammates , I 'll see you before the match tonight .
#Text=Asami and I have a lunch date .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Okay , we 'll check you guys later , you know , we 'll see you when we see ya .
#Text=" Bolin says : " So , Korra .
#Text=There they go , here we are , all alone in the gym , just you and me , two alone people .
#Text=Together .
#Text=Alone .
#Text=" Korra says : " Ah , I got ta head back to the air temple to train with Tenzin .
#Text=See ya !
#Text="
